project.name: helloaca
project.description: AI Contract Analyzer that helps small law firms, real estate agents, and business owners detect contract risks, clauses, and obligations within 30 seconds.

branding.logo_style: minimal wordmark with AI-inspired letter A and a balance-scale icon integrated subtly

architecture.ai_engine: GPT-5 or GPT-4-turbo for clause and risk extraction

core_features.name: Contract Upload
core_features.description: User uploads a contract (PDF or DOCX). File is processed via OCR (if image-based) and sent to the AI analysis endpoint.

core_features.name: AI Risk & Clause Analysis
core_features.description: AI model scans uploaded contract for key clauses, obligations, deadlines, and risks. Returns structured JSON and summary.

output_format.summary: Plain-text summary of contract obligations and risks

core_features.name: Chat with Contract
core_features.description: User chats with an AI agent about specific contract details (like 'Who is responsible for payment?'). AI uses semantic retrieval from contract text.

core_features.name: AI PDF Report Export
core_features.description: Generate downloadable AI report (PDF) summarizing all findings, risks, and recommendations. Includes brand styling.

core_features.name: Dashboard & History
core_features.description: Users can view previous analyzed contracts, chat logs, and report downloads.

api_endpoints.name: POST /api/upload
api_endpoints.function: Handles file upload and saves metadata to database

api_endpoints.name: POST /api/analyze
api_endpoints.function: Sends document text to AI for clause/risk analysis and returns structured output

api_endpoints.name: POST /api/chat
api_endpoints.function: Handles chat queries and returns context-aware responses

api_endpoints.name: GET /api/reports
api_endpoints.function: Fetch user reports and analysis history
